import React from 'react' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import './UserPage.css' import StyledHeader from '../components/StyledHeader' import Footer from '../components/Footer' import { mammals, avians, mythic, aquatic, insects, misc } from '../assets/PetSpecies' import { FontAwesomeIcon } from '@fortawesome/react-fontawesome' import { readAllPets } from '../services/pets' export default function UserPage(props) { return ( <> Home Adoption Zone Logout {props.currentUser &&

Welcome back, {props.currentUser.username}!

}
{ readAllPets() }
{/* use readAllPets to find all the pets where user_id matches props.currentUser.id*/}
) }
